hadiths.text: Narrated Usama b. Zaid :Usama b. Zaid (Allah be pleased with him) said: Allah's Messenger, God willing, where will you stay tomorrow? Thereupon he (the Holy Prophet) said: Has 'Aqil left any accommodation for us?

chapter.ara-name: باب النُّزُولِ بِمَكَّةَ لِلْحَاجِّ وَتَوْرِيثِ دُورِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Pilgrims staying in Makkah, and Inheriting its houses
